CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 31, 1953, pg. 10, reads: "Musical Salon - Sunday, Oct. 25, was the occasion of the first in a series of musical salons given by Marie Carter Hayes in her Frankstown Avenue studio. The talented participants pictured here include, seated, Mrs. Hayes and James Miller.  Standing: Mrs. Mary Eubanks and Robert Mosley. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Marie Carter Hayes and James Miller seated at piano, with Mary Eubanks and Robert Mosley or Mosely standing beside them, for musical salon in Hayes School of Music, 6490 Frankstown Avenue, East Liberty
